item.title: What to do after EDA?
item.description:
Data science is divided into six steps:

1. Define problem.
2. Gather Data
3. Explore Data
4. Model with Data
5. Evaluate model
6. Answer the problem.

Once you are done with first three steps, you are ready to implement a model on your data. This article will explain and â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sara Massey
